Text: How can you play this game using a PS2 Emulator? Please tell me, I want to play it!

Well do some hunting online the emulator must have the correct bios and be configurated right.

you also must have a powerful computer with lots of ram the quality won't be as good as using real hardware aka a modded ps2.
